name: A Trebled Note
description:
Controls:

Up Arrow Key to go up

Down Arrow Key to go down

Criteria

Endless Runner: Player is endlessly running around to kill people

Happy:  Main Character is always smiling

Hyperactive:  Character animations are hyperactive.

Chiptune: Chiptunified background music Strauss Tritsch Tratsch Polka by John Strauss

Credits

Art and Programming by Chai Tae

Music by John Strauss
